JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Travel Advisor with Danish and English, Sofia, Bulgaria
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Please note that the position is based in Sofia, Bulgaria and we will help you to relocate

You’ve always dreamed of discovering the World? You can do it NOW and more importantly you can do it every day!

Work for one of our clients who helps people to live their dreams - join the leader of the BPO sector TELUS International Europe!

As a Travel Advisor with Danish and English you will be a part of a great team and all together will:

  • Communicate with international customers daily by phone and email
  • Consult others about traveling requests in a professional manner
  • Find the best solution for everyone and propose different options concerning what’s the best for the customers
  • Identify customers and record data

As a candidate, you do not need to have experience in a similar role but you should have a good level of Danish and English and enjoy the selling process.

In Return, We will give you:

  • Relocation assistance
  • Stable job and career development opportunities
  • Attractive salary
  • Fully paid training
  • Special discounts and offers (Food vouchers, Multisport card, etc.)
  • Additional health insurance & Transportation allowance
  • Special benefits for our team members (Gym, yoga classes, massages, and corporate psychologist in the office)
  • Positive international working environment (Relax zones, PlayStation, and billiard corners)
  • Continuous support and learning
  • Employee referral bonuses & Recognition programs

We care about the well–being of our employees, invest in their future growth, and encourage fun and team-building projects!

Does it sound like the perfect job for you? Apply now!

Does it sound like the perfect job for you? Apply now!

Send your CV to SourcingBG@telusinternational.com or apply here:

https://jobs.telusinternational.com/en_US/careers/Pipelinedetails?pipelineId=11761&source=%5BTIB%5D+EURES&tags=eures.dk%7Cdanish

(from EURES Bulgaria)

 

About us:

TELUS International Bulgaria is a publicly-traded company (NYSE & TSX: TIXT) and is the largest employer in the CX (Customer Experience) industry in the country with over 4,000 team members. The company provides a broad portfolio of services - designing, building, and delivering next-generation digital services, AI solutions, customer experience, and much more. The company's primary focus is strict adherence to all our clients' procedures and practices. We are an independent outsourcing services provider and do not function as a local representation of our partners. 

Our location Sofia, Bulgaria is famous for its cultural diversity, modern appearance and prosperous location. This fast-growing city is located next to Vitosha mountain where enthusiasts often can be found hiking or skiing. The capital offers a big variety of experiences annually – music and theater, outdoor festivals, as well galleries, museums, restaurants and clubs.

https://www.telusinternational.com/careers
